I'd use the cliche to answer the question: It depends.

If one is working with more practical staffs, it's rare to use any math in projects. calc man-day would be one of the hardest things in math.

But if they're things related to protocols and why they're better or worse than counterparts, it's impossible to understand them without math. e.g. nth-shortest path, queuing, and etc.
